mapper.select:
select a.user_login_name userLoginName, a.user_name userName, a.user_sex userSex, a.user_phone userPhone, a.user_mail userMail, a.user_idcard userIdcard
from t_sys_user_info a where a.is_deleted = 0
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and a.user_login_name like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
and a.user_role like concat('%', #{role}, '%')
order by create_time desc
